amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Secretary of Education to award grants, contracts, and cooperative agreements to institutions of higher education to demonstrate methods, techniques and procedures for ensuring equal educational opportunity for individuals with learning disabilities in postsecondary education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 77 in the Congressional Record of April 30, 1998 to create a new Title XI to establish a demonstration project to develop ways to provide equal educational opportunity for individuals with learning disabilities at institutions of higher education.
